content:
Here is a link to a Dropbox folder with five conference photographs taken by our photographer:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9pn6ubjcwp93usf/AABEtiHalfy0B_wDZTBlqmHga?dl=0
There is one in which we all Lean together.
I will eventually put one or two smaller, compressed versions on the "participants" page of the web page, and link to the folder.
